title: Get fields of an Instant Form or direct message leads

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: lead_source
parameters.description: The source of the leads. Enum values: INSTANT_FORM : leads generated through an Instant Form. DIRECT_MESSAGE : leads generated from direct messages of the associated Business Account.

parameters.name: advertiser_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when the leads are under an ad account. Advertiser ID.

parameters.name: library_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when the leads are under a form library of a Business Center. ID of a form library. To obtain the list of form libraries within a Business Center, use /page/library/get/ .

parameters.name: page_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when lead_source is INSTANT_FORM . Not supported when lead_source is DIRECT_MESSAGE . The page ID of an Instant Form. To obtain a list of Instant Forms, use /page/get/ and set business_type to LEAD_GEN .

examples.title: Get fields of an Instant From
Get fields of direct message leads
